mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seller_space (space_num, space_name, users_num, oneliner, intro, imagePath, addr, cate_name) VALUES(seller_space_seq.NEXTVAL, #{space_name}, #{users_num}, #{oneliner}, #{intro}, #{imagePath}, #{addr}, #{cate_name})
